searchDocs.title: add​
searchDocs.content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> MyFirstClass2:add( a: number,-- The first number you want to add b: number-- The second number you wanna add ) → number-- Returns the sum of a and b This is a very fancy function that adds a couple numbers.
